hooks.command: bash -c 'json_input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".cwd" | xargs basename); if command -v osascript >/dev/null 2>&1; then osascript -e "display notification \"Claude completed task in $cwd\" with title \"Claude Code\""; elif command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send "Claude Code" "Claude completed task in $cwd"; fi'

bash -c 'json_input=$(cat); tool_name=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".tool_name"); file_path=""; if echo "$json_input" | jq -e ".tool_response.filePath" > /dev/null 2>&1; then file_path=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".tool_response.filePath"); elif echo "$json_input" | jq -e ".tool_input.file_path" > /dev/null 2>&1; then file_path=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path"); elif echo "$json_input" | jq -e ".tool_input.relative_path" > /dev/null 2>&1; then cwd=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".cwd"); rel_path=$(echo "$json_input" | jq -r ".tool_input.relative_path"); file_path="$cwd/$rel_path"; fi; timestamp=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"); echo "[$timestamp] Hook triggered: $tool_name on $file_path" >> /tmp/claude-lint-hook.log; if [[ "$file_path" == *.ts ]]; then echo "ðŸ”§ Running lint on $file_path (via $tool_name)..."; echo "[$timestamp] Running eslint --fix on $file_path" >> /tmp/claude-lint-hook.log; lint_output=$(npx eslint "$file_path" --fix 2>&1); if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "âœ… Lint passed for $file_path"; echo "[$timestamp] Lint SUCCESS: $file_path" >> /tmp/claude-lint-hook.log; else echo "âŒ Lint failed for $file_path"; echo "[$timestamp] Lint FAILED: $file_path" >> /tmp/claude-lint-hook.log; echo "--- LINT FAILURE REPORT ---" > "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "File: $file_path" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "Timestamp: $timestamp" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "Tool: $tool_name" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "$lint_output" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; echo "To fix: npx eslint $file_path --fix" >> "$cwd/lint_failures.log"; fi; else echo "[$timestamp] Skipped (not .ts file): $file_path" >> /tmp/claude-lint-hook.log; fi'
